column1: al bynum| al bynum 04/13/1943 ~ 06/10/2015garner- johnny al bynum
column4: died wednesday at wake medical center surrounded by his family. born in wake county
column5: he was the son of the late john wesley and stella murray bynum. he retired from jesse jones (con-agra foods) with 44 years of loyal service as a maintenance supervisor. after he retired
column6: he was actively involved with bynums greenhouses
column7: inc. he was a loving husband
column9: papa and friend who touched the lives of so many. he enjoyed family gatherings
column10: grandchildrens sporting events and making sausage
column11: pork bbq and bbq sauces for his family and friends. funeral services will be 11:00 am saturday at bryan-lee funeral chapel
column12: garner. burial will follow at montlawn memorial park
column13: raleigh. the family will receive friends from 6:00-8:00 pm friday at the funeral home and all other times at his home. . survivors include his wife of 53 years
column16: tina parsons (derek) and tara germonto; son
column21: ryder parsons and britany curry (darrell); 3 step-grandchildren
column24: annibelle lovelace and many nieces and nephews. in addition to his parents
column25: he was preceded in death by a sister
column27: james hilliard bynum. visitation06/12/20156:00-8:00 pmbryan-lee funeral home garner1200 benson rd garner
